item.title: From (Python) zero to hero: How beginner university students learn programming
item.description:
Description

Are you curious about how to teach programming effectively? Are you a Python fan interested in everything Python-related? Or would you simply like to see a non-standard presentation? If you answered yes at least once, then this funny and inspiring talk is right for you! In less than 20 minutes, you'll hear from a young student-teacher about:

  • What coding skills are taught to beginners and how
  • Experience with teaching
  • A few surprises

No technical knowledge is needed (some code samples will be shown, but they're not essential). Discussion at the end is welcome. Looking forward to seeing you!
item.dc:creator: Valdemar Švábenský
